Description:
UNDER OFFER / UNDER CONTRACT
This amazing home unit will be a joy to own. Start saying 'wow' upon entry and from there it just gets better.
Light filled with its northerly aspect and positioned in one of the most sought after pockets in Clayton South, there is absolutely nothing more you could want out of this spacious, open plan, street front villa unit.
Comprising of 2 good size bedrooms, large central living area, deluxe kitchen overlooking spacious family meals, renovated central bathroom, laundry and WC.
Features Include: stainless steel appliances, polished floor boards, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, mirrored built in robes and quality window furnishings.
Further enhanced by a delightful picturesque private courtyard, garage accommodation, which ideally could be used as a games, utility or study room, additional off street parking, and huge front garden.
Close to all family amenities, with easy access to parks, train Station, bus services and Monash Medical.
Insights: 1/62 Bevan Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Top Quality Family Home! Even Greater Location!
This spacious and magnificent family home is perfectly situated in one of Clayton South's finest streets with privacy & peaceful surroundings. Beautifully designed to the highest standards and right next to Clarinda Shopping Centre, cafes, restaurants, bus stops, and only minutes away from the leafy green Bald Hill Park, St Andrew'S School, Huntingdale Train Station(Zone 1) and Clayton Central, this will sure to excite you!
As you walk into this fabulous fully renovated and designed home with spacious living area, the flowing floor plan will lead you to generous size living room plus study, two spacious master bedrooms with ensuites and BIRs, and two more bedrooms, plus studio with own kitchen. Separate laundry room, modern central bathroom and separate toilet. Modern open plan kitchen with stone benchtops and dining area, with sliding doors leading to the beautiful alfresco with bi-fold doors and private garden, which is perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Comprising: fully renovated family home, five generous size bedrooms plus study, two kitchen, three bathrooms, ducted heating, ceiling fans, lockup garage and much, much more!
Inspect now and make an offer!

Description:
Land with Town Planning Permit for 4 Townhouses
Rarely does an exclusive luxury townhouse redevelopment like this present itself in Clayton South. This development site has pending town planning permits for 4 two storey townhouses.
This property with a land of 880sqm approx. in a lovely tree lined street only moments from public transport, schools and Clarinda Shopping Centre as well as central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station With a neat 3 bedroom home, ready to rent out, giving you income, before the construction process being organized.
There are proposed plans for 4 double storey townhouses, plans available from the agent. Don't miss this outstanding opportunity.
Do not hesitate to contact Ivy Liu for more information.
Photo ID Required
Ivy Liu : 0433 163 766

Description:
Best Location Ever! Exceptional Modern Elegance!
Land Size: 225m2 APPROX with your own driveway
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this beautiful double storey residence with your own driveway situated within walking distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
This architecturally designed townhouse with excellent craftsmanship throughout features ensuite to master bedroom, 2 large bedrooms with build-in-robes, spacious open living area, high-end appliances and finishing's, modern bathrooms, open plan kitchen with island stone benchtops, extra-large fridge space, gas ducted heating, split system air conditionings, home security system, water tank, automatic roller shutters, double glazed windows and much, much more!
With your fabulous private outdoor area with low maintenance courtyard, it is a perfect and practical design for your daily life, plus entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
Beautiful & Bright, Botanic Drive Welcomes You!
Combining contemporary aesthetics & modern living, this townhouse presents exceptional style & comfort for family living. Natural light abundantly flows through the open plan living & dining area, highlighting the caesar stone bench tops and stylish kitchen. A welcoming paved patio awaits for entertaining & relaxing with an additional lush grass area. Venturing upstairs 3BRs (master with WIR & ensuite) are serviced by a superb central bathroom. Located in an enviable position minutes from Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College & Primary School & Springvale Homemaker Centre. Featuring lock up garage, powder room & ducted heating.
PHOTO 'ID' MUST BE PROVIDED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS AND PHONE NUMBER WITH ALL INQUIRIES

Description:
A CLASSIC & BEAUTIFULLY MAINTAINED HOME WITH A BRIGHT FUTURE
Displaying a timeless brick faÃ§ade, this home wears its classic style with pride thanks to a lifetime of caring owners who have pampered it ensuring its condition remained impressive. And today its new owner can capitalize on this great legacy and simply move in, rent it out or maybe even update and modernise it to suit their needs while adding significant value. Inside you find a generous lounge room with gas heater as well as a meals area adjoining the timeless timber kitchen with 700mm upright oven/stove and a large pantry. There are 3 generous bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes plus a family bathroom with a separate toilet off the large laundry. Ducted heating has been added for additional winter comfort while outside you find a single garage with additional work or storage space and a generous backyard with great entertaining potential. And with Westall primary and secondary schools right at the end of the road the home is also close to local strip shops, buses and Westall train station.

Description:
A LARGE FAMILY HOME POSITIONED PERFECTLY!
This large family home on approximately 588 square metres is located within minutes walk to St Andrew's Primary was custom designed and built to suit the needs of a young family and today it still offers impressive space, flexibility and great potential for the next generation to explore. Set privately behind gardens bursting with Spring colour, the home somehow seems a size larger than normal with all the rooms deliberately bigger. There's a generous L-shaped lounge/dining room as well as a timber lined kitchen with a movable island bench, gas oven/stove and an included meals area. All 3 bedrooms are simply huge and the family bathroom features separate toilet and shower rooms. Extras include ducted heating, multiple split system air conditioning units and an alarm while outside you find a lush back garden and generous accommodation between the gated double carport and the 2 car garage/workshop behind. Set right near St Andrews Primary School, Namatjira Park, the home is ideally positioned with buses, Clarinda Shopping Centre, and central Clayton all just minutes away.
Insights: 6 Ester Crescent, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2014 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Invest, move in, or a bit of both
This long cherished family home offers excellent space. Set back from the street this home enjoys an elevated porch,
welcoming entry, 3 good size bedrooms, sun-filled lounge & dining area, an adjourning kitchen with adjacent meals area, central bathroom with separate bath, shower & toilet facilities and laundry area. Easy access to Monash University, walking distance to Westall Station and Westall High School, makes this home a very viable proposition! Inspection is a must.

Description:
Good Size Home in Great Location!
Ideal for first home buyers or smart investors this 3 bedroom home with own street frontage and no body corporate fees is within waking distance to train station, schools, parks and only minutes away from Clayton shops, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
Located on a good size block of 385sqm approximately, the property comprises formal entry opening to L-shape lounge/dining room, modern kitchen with meals area and gas cooking, 3 large bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. Other features include: polished hardwood timber floors, gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, single lock up garage and another car space for extra comfort.
Don't miss your opportunity to purchase a home in an area full of potential and growth. For more information call Rene on 0413 330 357.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Development of a Life Time! 765sqm approx.
Attention home buyer, investor, and developer!! Live there, or rent it out, or put in students. Strategically positioned from a developer perspective, this ideally located allotment has the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A) with the Clayton bus going past the front door and within easy walking distance of Westall Train Station, close proximity to the Princes Highway and the IKEA Shopping Centre, Springvale Central, Clayton Central, Monash Hospital, Monash University, local shops, schools, and short drive to Chadstone Shopping Centre; what more can you want?
Features included: Three spacious bedrooms with study or fourth bedroom, central bathrooms, kitchen with gas stove and gas hot water, gas heating, evaporative cooling system, 2 large living areas, single door garage, all set on a massive block of land of 765sqm approx. with two street access.
With an enormous frontage of 14.9m approx., this property would be your best investment for years to come!
Inspect now before it is too late!

Modern Spacious 4 Bedroom Home in a Fantastic Location!
Excellent opportunity available for the home buyer or astute investor to secure this spacious updated home situated within walking distance to Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
This fantastic home boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, central tiled bathroom, kitchen with stone benchtop, separate laundry area, polished timber flooring throughout all bedrooms, living and dining area, and floor tiles to wet areas, concrete paved courtyard perfect for entertainment with families and friends and with minimum work required for garden maintenance, and double carport with its own driveway.
With everything at your fingertips and close to all amenities, this stylish and modern home will be your next dream residence!
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, one of the best residences in the area!

Description:
WELCOME HOME
Presenting a superb and excellent opportunity to secure a fantastic family home in the coveted suburb of Clayton South.
Moments away from Monash Hospital, Monash University, Westall Secondary College, train and public transport, Clayton and Springvale shopping centres.
Exceptionally presented this single level home is situated behind secure electric gates offering wonderfully proportioned spaces for those looking for a family friendly easy care lifestyle.
The light infused entrance hall is a welcoming first impression and leads through to the hub of the home. Family living and dining areas with separate rumpus/media room provide ample room for the whole family to spread out comfortably.
The gourmet American Oak timber kitchen with extra long bench top, stainless steel appliances and loads of storage is the heart of the home allowing you to mingle with friends and family while cooking up a storm.
Two comfortable bedrooms with BIRs and a master bedroom with en-suite and WIR, main bathroom, separate toilet and a large laundry with storage.
Included in the package is an outdoor alfresco entertaining area complete with kitchenette for entertaining or enjoying outdoor meals. Then relax in your very own sauna in a private outdoor room complete with shower.
This home is very well equipped with hydronic heating, Coonara wood heater, ducted heating and cooling , split system air conditioner, solar panels, floating floor boards to lounge room, double remote control garage, extra parking for boat, cars and trailer all behind a secure electric gate.
Property Code: 2393

Description:
AFFORDABILITY PLUS POTENTIAL
On a corner block entering into a quiet court, this home offers a set of possibilities with its condition dictating it would either suit a comprehensive renovation or, with this great block of land you may choose to start over and build a brand new luxury home for your family (all options STCA). Set privately behind a fully fenced front yard this is a secluded oasis for your family with the home offering polished hardwood floors throughout, an L-shaped lounge/dining room, meals area and a kitchen with upright gas oven/stove. There are 3 bedrooms including 2 with built in wardrobes as well as a family bathroom, separate toilet and a full laundry. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling are also included while outside you find generous front and rear yards plus a double carport secured by a roller door to the street. And its quiet position is still within minutes of buses, Clayton South Primary School, Clarinda Shopping Centre and central Clayton.

Description:
This young quality stylish architect design modern 3 bedroom double-storey brick residence
This young quality stylish architect design modern 3 bedroom double-storey brick residence offers you comfortable low maintenance living.
Conveniently located within 2 minutes walk to Westall station, you can reach the City by train in 30-35mins. Fantastic location with minutes walk to Rosebank avenue shops, post office, primary schools and college. Only a short drive to Ikea, Clayton shopping centre, Springvale shopping Centre, Monash University, Monash Hospital and Monash Free way.
Contemporarily designed with 3 mirror bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, the residence comes with open-plan living and a private landscaped outdoor entertainment area. The master bedroom provides maximum comfort and style with its own en-suite, and a spectacular view to the recreation grassland.
This property has its own street front so there is NO BODY CORPORATE. Great for a young family ready to move in or a keen investor wanting rental return at $500 per week - this home is a good bargain and will go quick.
Settlement term is negotiable (2-6 months). Please call or email to make inquiries.
Property Features:
Ducted heating
Split system Air Conditions
Designer kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops
Glass splash back
Stainless steel Multifunction oven
Dishwasher
Gas hot plates
Ducted Range hood
Blinds
Ceramic floor tiles
Light Fitted dinning and living areas
Rainwater tank
Double garage with remote controlled door and rear access
Private landscaped outdoor entertainment area and front garden
Separate laundry and powder room
Additional storage under stairs and in garage
100% wool Carpeted bedrooms
BIR's in all bedrooms
Drought tolerant plants
5-star energy rating

Description:
Brand New Townhouse Auction This Saturday!
This magnificent brand new townhouse is perfectly situated in one of finest streets in Clayton South with privacy & peaceful surroundings. Architecturally designed to the highest standards and right next to Keeley Reserve, this will sure to excite you! Within walking distance to Clayton Shopping Strips, Community Centre, Clayton Train Station, Westall Train Station and a short drive to Monash University, Monash Medical Centre, IKEA Home Centre, Chadstone Shopping Centres, you will not find a better growth location!
As you walk into this fabulous architecturally designed home with high ceiling, the flowing floor plan will lead you to the elegant open living room with modern open kitchen and separate dining area, one spacious bedroom, modern family bathroom and laundry room downstairs, plus two master bedrooms upstairs with ensuite and WIRs, plus sliding doors leading to the beautiful alfresco with timber decking, perfect for entertaining family and friends.
Comprising: down lights throughout, separate living room and dining area, two master bedrooms with ensuite and WIRs, central bathroom, 40mm stone benchtops, stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, powder room, split system air conditionings, 2000L water tank, remote controlled garage and much, much more!
Last chance to inspect and secure this fantastic property, the unique residence in the area!

Description:
DON'T MISS THIS ONE
Consider this attractive brick veneer home, set on a substantial block on approx 702sqm. Located between Clayton and Springvale Shopping Centre and with easy access to Westall High School and Primary School, train station and bus. Comprising of entry with polished timber floors, sun filled lounge with a view to the front garden, spacious kitchen with a gas stove top and meals area, 4 bedrooms of which 3 have robes, bathroom with separate shower and separate bath tub, laundry and huge rear yard. Front garden is securely fenced with a huge driveway that accommodates 4 cars and side access over 6 metres wide. Ideal for dual occupancy (STCA) . Land 16.7 m x 42.06 m
Terms 10% dep. Bal 30/60 days. ID required for entry. CALL TO INSPECT 95444611

Address: B225/60 Autumn Terrace CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169
Description:
Lifestyle and Location Into One, Vendor Must Sell!
Internal: 83sqm, Balcony 11sqm, Total: 94sqm
This fantastic north east facing property will appeal to both the first home buyer and the astute investor. Presenting a rare and perfect opportunity within walking distance to Westall Train Station, minutes drive to Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University and IKEA shopping centre.
This beautiful 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment features master bedroom with WIR and ensuite, heating and cooling split air conditioning system, down lights throughout, modern bathroom, generous size kitchen with stainless steel oven, rangehood and cooktop, beautiful glass splashback, dishwasher, spacious balcony, underground car parking and much, much more!
Inspect now as this property will not last long!

Description:
At the Centre of Everything
This ground floor apartment offers kitchen with stainless steel appliances, two bedrooms, secure underground parking, split system heating/cooling and intercom security entrance. Additionally, the property offers a large private rear courtyard, uncommon in most apartments.
Situated across from Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University, this unique development is the ideal location for both the investor, or the first home buyer looking to break into this most sort after apartment-style living.
The property is located directly opposite the Clayton Community Centre which includes a library, pre-school, occasional care, youth and family services, maternal and child care services, cafe, gymnasium, an indoor aquatic facility and community health services.

Description:
Conveniently Located with Huge Balcony!
This 2 bedroom apartment, close to train station will impress the most discerning of buyers. With quality carpets, fixtures and fittings, this home is under 2 years old and boasts; 2 spacious bedrooms with built in robes, master with ensuite, large living, dining, tiles to all wet areas, well appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops. The contemporary bathroom is a real WOW, with a European style laundry included and a huge balcony for those warm balmy nights to relax on. Other features include: air conditioning, heating and undercover car space on title. Within walking distance to Westall Train Station, schools, Springvale Homemaker Centre, shops, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University. With high rental returns achievable and in such a convenient location, this is surely an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Calling all Developers and Investors!
Plenty of choices with this decent sized block of land approximately 710sqm. Renovate, develop (STCA), extend or build your dream home are the options that can be seriously considered with this property. Existing 3 bedroom family home comprises of 3 bedrooms, lounge, dining area, central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry, single garage, carport and a bungalow at the back. This property is located in a very sought after area of Clayton South, only a short stroll to Clayton train station, shops, local schools and beautiful Keeley Park, as well as being only minutes away from Monash University, Monash Hospital and Monash Freeway. So please don't miss out on this unique opportunity for future development and investment, call Rene on 0413 330 357.
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
